channel.title: Need help with server!
channel.description:
:| uhhh i need help im trying to spawn npc's and i found the spawn npc list but everytime i try to run server it comes up and says Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 703 2605 3165 0 0 0 0 0 ghost" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at net.com.espeon.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.loadNPCs(LoadNPCLists.java:4 9) at net.com.espeon.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.<init>(LoadNPCLists.java:23)
at net.com.espeon.Engine.<init>(Engine.java:115) at net.com.espeon.Server.main(Server.java:69) Press any key to continue . . . :eek: help? :confused:

item.title: Need help with server!
item.dc:creator: @lewiskitapci lewiskitapci
item.description:
@lewiskitapci wrote:

"1 703 2605 3165 0 0 0 0 0 ghost"
make sure its all spaced right (like all the others or your going to continue to get these errors.)

Read full topic
